text: Ke timile bani isra'ilako mukhiyaharula'i dekhenaum? Jasale musapachi aphna paigambarasita bhane ki tapa'imle hamro lagi e'uta raja niyukta garidinus taki hami allahako margama dharmayud'dha garaum. Paigambarale bhane ki yadi timiharuko lagi jihadako adesa anivarya huncha bhane, bera chaina ki yud'dha garna asvikara garihala. Tiniharule bhannathale ki hami allahako margama kina yud'dha gardainaum jaba ki hami aphna vatanabata niskasita ra santanaharubata alaga gari'eka chaum. Pheri jaba tiniharumathi yud'dhako adesa ayo taba kehi manisaharu baheka sabaile inkara garihale, allaha atyacariharula'i ramrari cindacha
